Make no mistake, state and federal attempts to erase reproductive rights are a direct attack on women and will increase maternal deaths. Attacks on women’s health and attempts to strip women of their bodily autonomy must end.
The decision to terminate a pregnancy is a deeply personal and delicate choice, one that should be made by a woman in consultation with her doctor and loved ones - not by the government.
I’m proud to be on the right side of history with my vote today for the #EqualityAct. Now the Senate must act.
